answers.answer: Please get yourself tested for Diabetes, and also recollect you had any injury recently?Take care and visit a Physician if it does not resolve in couple of days.Take care

question: I have swelling on the top of my foot with red spots.  There is not swelling in my ankle, toes, or the bottom of my foot.  There is no pain, but a slight tingling feeling.
title: swelling on top of foot
